website_summaries.verdict: Well-made sideboard with a rustic yet classy look. Worth the effort it takes to put it together.
pros: Classic design with cabinets and open shelves
Distressed wood finish gives it a rustic flair
cons: Lots of small pieces make it difficult to assemble
Some packages arrived with missing screws

customer_reviews.title: Wow .
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product . I was so nervous purchasing it as I was worried about the quality.. but by far this quality is amazing and very durable . Putting this piece together was actually fun with a drill and to be honest very easy and light enough to have only one person do it . My husband was happy I didn't ask for his help (for once) . Super impressed with this piece and it's the perfect size for our small apartment ! A must have for storing things . Super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buffet table
customer_reviews.text: I really love this buffet table! Its exactly what I was looking for and looks wonderful in our kitchen! It took 2 hours to put together, directions were easy to follow. However be warned the backing is cardboard- why I gave 4 stars instead of 5. It’s cheaply made but giving the price I didn’t expect it to be very solid.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy assembly and a great quality for the price! Very happy with my purchase. It took me a while to find the perfect table for under my tv. This was the perfect size. Tv is 75”. And due do it being right in front of my stairs I didn’t want anything that stuck out from the wall too much. But it needed to be tall enough. Very very happy :)))
customer_reviews.author: Danthony

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting a farmhouse looking coffee “bar” and that is incredibly hard to find and expensive. After endless browsing I stumbled upon this, and after taking measurements knew this would work perfectly! For the first time ever, I might say that the “do it yourself” assembly, was not only easy to follow, but all of the holes were in the exact spots they were supposed to be in, and the detailed manual made it a breeze. Often times, this is not the case. This would really look great anywhere and I look forward to it’s use for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Taisha W.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the matching L desk first and when I came across this I knew I had to have it as well. It takes a lot less time to put together than the large desk and the directions are very straight forward and easy to follow. They go great together in my home office/ art studio room. Personally, I bought this piece to store art supplies like sketch books, paintbrushes, etc. and its perfect for it! This is definitely worth the price, especially for the set. I would absolutely recommend this to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for what I purchased it for
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I purchased it for. Fits neatly in my kitchen and holds all the stuff that used to cover the counters. I have a small kitchen, so the counter space is very important. Only bad thing about it is that it is not made of solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Cute cabinet that doesn't take up too much space
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it was to assemble. It took about an hour. The hinges were a little tricky but we figured it out and the cabinet doors open and close nicely. They don't have magnets or anything. They just open and shut. The whole shelf is smaller than what we thought it would look like. But our house is small so it fits nicely here. The shelves are deep enough for two DVDs stacked in front of each other. It's not real wood in case a person didn't read the construction description.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: While assembling, which was very easy, I was dismayed to see "do not use as TV stand", which is why I purchased the item! However, I believe that the recommendation was for old, heavy tube type TV's, where stability might have been an issue. The cabinet can easily handle a reasonable weight. I have a 30" flat screen, and it is working out perfectly. (went through a 6.5 earthquake just fine, I should add) However, in a child-based household, I'd probably think twice about it. And either send the kid away, or attach this cabinet to the wall. Or possibly attach the kid to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece but not a true antique white...
customer_reviews.text: Love the piece of furniture! However, slightly dissapointed in the color... it was listed as antique white but it’s definitely more of beige color with yellowish tone. As far as assembly, it was pretty easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Easy, easy, easy assemble. Together with my friend's 70 years old mom, I assembled this storage cabinet one evening after work. It took us less than 2 hours. We did had a little trouble with the hinges. My husband assist us with that. Happy that I bought it. BTW the hardware were all labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Def MUST Buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this piece! The instructions were step by step and my son helped me put this together. It took us about 1.5 hours start to finish. Sturdy furniture , gorgeous color, arrived 4 days early. I could not be more pleased. I will be ordering more pieces from same company!
customer_reviews.author: J Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: One of the Easiest to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, I have assembled many 'mail order' furniture items(thanks honey...). By far, this has been the easiest to assemble. The contents of the box were packaged amazingly well. Everything was carefully wrapped and separated by Styrofoam. Each part is clearly identified and numbered. I really like how they separated out the hardware for each step. Each step has its own, clearly numbered, bag of screws/parts. Assembly Advice: When you open the box, you may be shocked at the number of parts. Separate and lay out the parts. The more space that you have to spread them out, the better.
customer_reviews.author: Jerad Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to assemble, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Dare I say, a piece of RTS furniture was actually a pleasure to assemble! Everything was clearly marked and properly cut and drilled. Everything fit together well. The instructions were clear and easy to follow (even a QR code to scan on a couple pages so you can see a video of what is being described in the picture). Holds together well and looks great! I hate assembling furniture, but if all the other brands built furniture like this I'd be more inclined to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Meanbat

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions listed are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely cabinet that we are using as a coffee bar and sideboard, but the dimensions shown are wrong. The cabinet itself is a few inches smaller in every direction than what is listed. It's about 2 inches shorter than it says and the cabinet dimensions are off by a solid 2 inches both in height and in depth.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Small Spaces!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter and I put it together. It wasn’t hard. Some of the holes did not align. All pieces are not secured but you can only tell when you move it. It displays just fine so as long as you don’t need to move it, it’s fine. A few minor defects but it looks nice in my daughter’s room and hardly takes up any space at all. Her TV is mounted to the wall so we are using it as a media storage underneath. It’s great for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: A. P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is super attractive, well made, and with clear directions. My husband and I put it together in about an hour and a half. All the pieces were there, everything fit as it should. The only part that I'm not keen on is the cardboard back. I didn't stress about it because, well, the price, and also I know if I really want to, I can replace it with a sheet of thin plywood. We've had no issues with durability though, nor with the backing. It hasn't become creaky with use, and it's proved to be a serviceable and attractive piece of furniture. I would buy it again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Knox

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice in my entry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piece of furniture for my entry way to store shoes in. I wish it was a bit taller and had one more shelf all the way across, but it is as close to perfect as I could find anywhere. Shoes fit in it nicely and they are finally out of the way and no longer tripping hazards all over my entry. The instructions to build it were easy to follow and my husband and I had it assembled in no time at all. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Small Dining Cabinet/Buffet
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Arrived in good shape and on time. Looks very nice in our small dining space. Not difficult for a 64 year old woman to put together with help from her 82 year old husband. Gives me the space I needed to set trays and dishes next to the dining table. Would work as a buffet if I ever have dinner guests. Cons: I don’t like the hinges; they didn’t go on well and I have to be careful opening the doors. The space inside the two side doors is extremely small, not very useful for me. The two middle open shelves work well. Overall not a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: It's solid but not to heavy
customer_reviews.text: Liked look of piece ,was easy to assemble though took time to do so.Has a old look as well that I liked. Finished product looks like advertised photo
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Comfort

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sketchy about buying.I decided to take a chance.I had my husband put it together it took him 1 hour n half. i was so anxious to see what it was gonna look like.I admit the only thing is we were trying to figure out where to put it in our kinda small nyc apt.Do your measurements what i should've done.Anyhow My husband thought this was no space n an unnecessary piece.(My 8 yr old and i lifted this) when he was asleep. we put it in the kitchen. It's not really heavy but is sturdy. I think it looks cute and so satisified with this Thank yoou! This is my pic with it
customer_reviews.author: Momma bear

customer_reviews.title: Great narrow buffet! Love the textured black.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly went smoothly. I figured it out as a 26 year old women and only needed a Phillips, a hammer, and one cup of coffee. It’s nice and narrow but also has a large amount of storage. Would definitely fit extra plates or serving dishes that hog kitchen cabinet space. Would be cute as a coffee bar too. The black is kind of textured looking, which I love (not that shiny cheap black). The shelves can be moved up or down (just rests on those peg things). The knobs are also beautiful and the whole thing is a decent weight. Feels sturdy. Overall great purchase and best price around!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW just WOW
customer_reviews.text: This storage cabinet is absolutely beautiful. I use it to store my dinner ware and glasses. It looks just like pictured. Came perfectly packed. Easy to read directions and without a magnifying glass. All the parts identified. Follow the easy instructions. What a nice piece to add to my home's decor. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a nice looking storage cabinet that held a lot and fit a very specific space. This cabinet checked off those boxes but I was incredibly surprised at how sturdy and heavy it felt. I figured for the price this would be a step above basic ikea furniture, but it fit my space. Putting it together wasn’t hard, but I’m used to buying and assembling flat pack furniture. Could be a little challenging to people not as comfortable doing that. I love how cute this cabinet is and standard cube bins fit behind the cabin doors for extra organization. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Armitage

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We buy tons of items on Amazon. I could write reviews each day if I had the time. My husband and I both agreed that we should take the time to write about this cabinet. We finished assembling it about an hour ago. It took around two hours to get it together. The instructions were well written and easy to follow. It's not an overly large piece so be sure to check the dimensions before buying. If it fits your space then by all means buy it, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hinges ruin this piece
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself with the picture instructions. Everything went together well until the hinges. There is a wide gap and the doors are unstable and wobbling. I spent 30 min with assembly and 3 hours playing with hinges (yes I watched the videos) to get one acceptable and the other still wobbly. The gap is distressing. Of course this is the last step, so what else can you do? You can never dismantle and fit back into the box to return. It would otherwise be an attractive piece, but the hinges make it not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blumberg

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Furniture
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews as well as looked at all the pictures and I loved that it is such a versatile piece of furniture. It can be used in so many ways. I myself use it to store my books since I didn’t want to buy a regular bookcase. I think it’s a piece of furniture that looks beautiful no matter where you put it or what you use it for. It came with easy instructions to follow and my husband was able to put it together in about an hour. I absolutely love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eli3

customer_reviews.title: cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived promptly. It was exactly what I was expecting. I put it together alone and found most of the directions to be very clear. The back is made of cardboard and did not fit properly. The top has a crack in the veneer running from front to back. Otherwise, it's fine for the purpose purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was quite easy to assemble. Having a drill helps, but mainly because I have arthritis and using a screw driver hurts. I out it together while watching TV so it probably took longer than it should have. We put it in the kitchen and it holds our microwave, fruit basket and food processor on top and we store other appliances inside. We love it so much we wanted to get another for the dinning room but the black has been out of stock for some time now.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Protectively packaged
customer_reviews.text: This arrived excellently packaged, there was zero damage, and it's beautiful once assembled. Assembly is rather easy, and the only thing that took a little more time was hanging the doors so that they were level. What a lovely piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this turned out. I assembled it myself, and it holds quite a bit. The shelves feel sturdy. It's not a jet black finish but almost a black/brown. My only issue was installing the doors. It took me forever to adjust those things using the instructions, which weren't helpful. If they're off a little bit, the door won't close or there's a giant gap on the sides or top/bottom. I don't think I ever got the doors to be consistent with each other, but at least they close.
customer_reviews.author: BookSurfer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: It is a tad bit shorter then what I’d actually want for a buffet table (too short to be a “coffee bar”), however, for the price you can’t beat it! The hidden shelves behind the cabinet perfectly store my toaster, 2 blenders, coffee bean grinder, as well as a few other small appliances and my small collection of cook books! I’m excited to decorate the top with a runner, decorations, and some pictures above ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Well built, easy to put together and a great price...
customer_reviews.text: I just love this cabinet. I bought two! One I use for my 50” tv and the other I use as a buffet for my dining room table. Both work well for my uses. Easy to put together and such a great price. They are very well built and I know I will get many years of use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J SavageTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our storage area in our downstairs bathroom. The quality is superb and it wasn't hard to put together at all. I think I saw others claiming it was difficult to assemble but it isn't as long as you can think things through. Even though it appears to be something you could buy from Wal-Mart it's quality isn't. It is very sturdy, they attempt to hide screw holes, and the hinges are very nice/tough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too many pieces.  A nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: It looks good on photo, but in reality its a piece of crapp. However at first glance, it looks expensive, just don't touch it.
customer_reviews.author: YlW

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: We needed a sleek liquor cabinet that would also serve as a media station (record player and speaker). This unit is absolutely perfect, it's easy to assemble and took me around 2 hrs (a lot of screw/dowel placements) to put together. The doors are great for eventual lock placement when kids are around. The only thing that would have been nice would be an L bracket to brace the unit against the wall, either way it isn't prone to tipping.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a power tool in my life, much less assembled anything. I was able to put this together on my own and I'm so proud! It did take me a long time, but anyone with any basic skills can do it quicker. Very sturdy and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: It’s like IKEA furniture but better!
customer_reviews.text: It’s like IKEA furniture but even better because the instructions are so much more clear and each piece is marked and the pictorial illustrations super clear. The quality is not high end but it’s sturdy enough that I’ll be using it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: mbchien

customer_reviews.title: Great As A Console Table
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a console table behind my couch and it’s perfect! The height and color are exactly as expected. I like that the interior shelves are adjustable. Assembly was easy (took 1.5hr by myself). Seems sturdy so far, but since this is particle board I’m not sure now long it will last. Either way, I think it’s worth the price and looks very high end from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such nice strong material, the knobs are perfect and the hinges are very nice as well, my husband put it together by himself in 1 hour. The only thing I didn't like was the back board was a very thin piece of cardboard that was supposed to be nailed into the edges, so I just decided not to add that part because for me I didn't need a backing to it, other than that it was exactly what I was looking for!!!
customer_reviews.author: Micky Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and functional piece of furniture that was easy to assemble. All the pre drilled holes and pieces were even and the painted finish was done well. It took my son and I about 25 minutes to put together. It’s made of pressed particles which should be expected considering the low price point. If you’re not expecting high end quality you’re going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: TNTX

customer_reviews.title: Lots of toy storage!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for living room toy storage! I bought the “13” Decorative Coiled Rope Square Base Tapered Basket Medium White” from target for the two open shelves in the middle and they fit perfect. I also got the 11x11 inch plastic weave baskets by Room Essentials from target and they fit in the side shelves! It fits ALOT of toys once it’s all said it done similar to a 6 cube shelf but way more appealing :)
customer_reviews.author: Breanna E.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little unit...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit to store my prop overflow. I’m a food blogger so I’ve accumulated a few extra props overtime. It’s a cute unit. Would have love some drawers but works as it. Arrive with a little scruff on the right door. I’ll apply some black shoe polish to fix that right up. A return would be just too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: brownsugar7210

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten compliments from visitors to my home (it's in my home office and I got the desk to match). My only problem with the assembly (or at all for that matter), was putting on the doors...I had to take them on and off a few times to get them to fit nicely without a gap on the side with the hinges. Able to do it all by myself without assistance and the finished product is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, sturdy, budget friendly statement piece.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a buffet with a plank style top, but this one fit my budget and space in my tiny kitchen, so I ordered it and customized it to how I want. I just used 4 1x4’s and cut them to the width of the unit but let them overhang a minuscule amount on the front and back as the outlet is behind the buffet anyways. Works perfect. Added matching shelving, not quite complete yet but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanna.

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking storage cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive storage cabinet that looks exactly like the pics and video. There's a bit of assembly (with easy-to-follow instructions), so grab a beer and queue up SVU and you'll build this in less than 2 episodes. The cabinet is long but not wide so it fits well in city apartments or wherever you need storage in limited spaces. Thoughtful details like the door pulls and elliptical contours make the unit look more expensive than it is. One of the better values I've found on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: David Collins

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabinet!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this purchase! It’s really beautiful for a put together yourself cabinet. My bf and I did it together with minimal annoyance. The instructions are clear and there is even a scan QR to a video! Beyond happy with this purchase. The color looks like the photo. It is sturdy and showed up looking great, no dings or scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine-S4

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but good value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the cost. I highly recommend using wood glue on the exposed wood edges during assembly since this is mainly stock particle board type furniture. Also the laminate is very cheap, mine arrived scratched in a lot of places out of the box, but a coat of high quality gloss spray paint and you correct that as well as customize for your decor.
customer_reviews.author: architect 71

customer_reviews.title: Solid for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, heavy, good looking buffet table. Its color would be called "aged cream" if I worked at Crayola. I don't think there is a better deal for what you get. The assembly is complex, though, so follow the instructions to a T.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...topcoat and paint pealing after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this great looking piece on Nov 5 and as the picture shows, the topcoat and paint is already coming off. Worst part is I can't return such a large piece of furniture. I do not know why my picture is not uploading!
customer_reviews.author: Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other Bush assemble-it-yourself products and have always been pleased with the results - this was no different. The instructions are easy to follow, and once everything is put together, the cabinet is solid and attractive. I wanted something only about 12" deep, but wide and with doors to cover some of the "stuff" - this cabinet was a perfect fit!.
customer_reviews.author: D. Masselink

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I hoped it would be. I use it in the dining room as a cookbook holder and I store my overflow drinks inside the cabinets. I had to mount mine to the wall because I have a small child who is constantly trying to rearrange my furniture. But if I hadn’t, I don’t believe it would fall over easily, it’s very well made. The directions were super easy to follow, probably put it together in 30 minutes or so. It’s exactly what I needed for my space
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H

customer_reviews.title: No instructions & missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the money to pay over $100. This is more like a $50 piece at most. Better off going to Home Goods. The amount of scratches and dents for such a piece is disappointing. I'll know better. No instructions and still in pieces and seems like there's missing pieces or just not much symmetry with this piece. Bought over a month ago.. Will update whenever I feel like testing my patience on the guessing game.
customer_reviews.author: Buyazon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, takes a while to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This did take a while to put together but that was expected, I really like the color/finish and the design of this. I bought it to use as a tv stand/ entertainment center and there is plenty of room on the top for the tv and the shelving space is nice. My package was missing the two bolts to attach the handles but I just bought them myself. I’ve put together a lot of furniture so I was fine with the directions but for someone who isn’t or doesn’t enjoy putting it together I wouldn’t recommend it, hinges and everything you need to install yourself.
customer_reviews.author: bdyndiuk

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I have a large vase and a 43 inch smart tv on top of this, and clothing in the inner shelves. It is a beautiful piece, and a friend of mine put it together. He has done a lot of this as he worked in a department store as a furniture salesman, and put many pieces of furniture like this together. It took him about 3 1/2 hours. He said it wasn't the easiest he's done, but it was worth the effort. I'm very pleased with it. I watch it every day since it's in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: franko

customer_reviews.title: Craft room addition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add to my craft room along with the matching bookcase. On top I have my minc machine, my stand to hold my heating gun and my embossing machine. It holds all three tools great. Inside has a lot of storage and I added two big baskets for the open storage which hold all of my CTMH Stamps. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a good choice and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is absolutely beautiful I have gotten so many comments about it. The heater thing works very well and you can feel the heat being thrown from the fireplace. It took four hours to assemble but I knew that before I bought it because someone else had said that it takes four hours so I knew. This was a good choice and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Marple

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this on my own with no trouble last night in just over an hour, and it looks even better than I had hoped in my kitchen. It was very easy to assemble, not too difficult to move on my own (I have short arms, so that was the hardest part). Definitely worth the money for something so useful to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the color was a little lighter than it looks online. Easy to assemble took a couple hours but it had all the hardware and it is very sturdy. I really like it. Storage is perfect for me. I would like to have more height but it works. I would like a black one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dinky

customer_reviews.title: Nice attractive, sturdy piece. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an accent/storage piece for my office. Of course, it's just laminated, pressed wood, but we built it with no problems in less than an hour and it looks really nice. I got the antique white color. It has just enough color and visual texture to make it fit into a country decor, but still looks fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jake/Julie/Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but will work.
customer_reviews.text: It is cheap quality. The back is a folded piece of cardboard. If you are not looking for anything expensive, fancy, or extremely nice than this piece of furniture will work. Instructions were very easy and was a breeze to put together. Arrived in good boxed condition.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a little storage for behind my home bar and it seems to be holding up pretty well. You definitely get what you pay for but considering the price tag I think it's a good value. It's pretty sturdy but it could be a little bit better in my opinion. The Finish is good but it is made of particle board not real wood.
customer_reviews.author: RI bourbon Enthusiasts

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I'd expected, but happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I do like the stand. However, I must say it was smaller than I'd expected and it was missing some hardware. Had to send husband to hardware store as I'd already put most of it together before realizing that parts were missing. But once put it together, it was sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenyatta J Strait

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great addition to my office. The quality of the material is good, not great. It is study and looks like real stained wood. You can see the staples on the front doors and will show nicks. Overall, very happy for the price and storage capacity.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this cabinet...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small buffet cabinet with shelves to accommodate some books, plants and collectibles. This piece was perfect for my needs, with the two open shelves and the two closed shelf areas. Although the cabinet is not made of solid wood, once assembled it is a solid and sturdy piece of furniture. Easy to assemble with the step by step instructions, gettting a proper balance on the doors was the most challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Jean

customer_reviews.title: good stand!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my record player/record collection. It's definitely perfect for my needs but had to leave the back off in order to fit the records in. It works well with the back off because I could put the speaker on the bottom shelf without worrying about drilling a hole for the cord. It's a good solid piece of furniture and looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Traci M

customer_reviews.title: The perfect accent stand.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect piece for my entry way. It is very solid, and instructions were perfect. I tend to take my time with things and still had it together in about 30 minutes. Very good quality, sturdiness, presentation for the money. Have gotten several compliments on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: The Bull

customer_reviews.title: Designed for easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: You can tell a lot of thought went into making this easy to assemble. I have assembled a few IKEA items and this was far easier. Screws in the hinges were pre-placed, all holes pre-drilled, and my favorite was the back board, normally I am doing math to spread the little nails evenly around the perimeter while also worrying about being too close to the edge but this had a template for each of the nails! The hinges were tricky, but 3 YouTube videos later I figured it out and now I can fix my kitchen cabinets too! Looks great feels sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet for entryway
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our mud room. They are wonderful and are really helping with the clutter. You can see that the color is more of a beige than a white, but I read the other reviews and knew this before ordering. They look great and serve their purpose. Middle cubbies are (each) 11.85" tall, 15.75" wide, and 11.46" deep .....for canvas baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Returned damaged item
customer_reviews.text: Item came with wood snapped in half, had to return. Did not reorder due to the fact if wood snapped during shipping figured it wouldn’t last long. Also the antique white has flecks of brown to make it antique I was looking for an off white
customer_reviews.author: michelle harper

customer_reviews.title: Great and beautiful cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Lovely cabinet. I hdd it to the entrance of my tiny apartment. Looks great! Narrow enough to fit in a hallway but with enough storage. Easy to installed, i did it by myself. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ABC

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and nice looking. I put it together alone.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is very sturdy. Since I put it in the center of my kitchen I put the back board on so the wood grain is on the outside. This serves me as storage for small appliances and decorative cannisters.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn hill

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Expectations exceeded and more!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly how could I not give this a 5 star review?! For the money this is a wonderful piece of furniture. It was everything I expected and more. For something bought off amazon the craftsmanship is very good. It’s not your average price of crap. It’s really sturdy and looks really good! Totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: really looks good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and son-in-law assembled this today. It seemed to be pretty hard but took about 2 hrs. It seemed like they could have used better written instructions. I really love the way it looks and wish I had ordered it sooner when I first told my daughter about. I only was disappointed in the cardboard back/
customer_reviews.author: Avid  Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is no longer in stock most places but a wonderful piece that looks just like photo's and my handiman said it was easy to put together. Came in perfect shape. It was the most economical piece like it that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Carole J. Magoffin

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid, I am VERY impressed by this piece of furniture. From the packaging to the instructions this was a great buy. There weren't any missing pieces, the holes all lined up nicely, and I was able to assemble it 99% of the way on my own within 1 hour. The look is clean and bright and it does feel like a sturdy piece. I'm looking forward to having it in my home. Thank you Amazon for offering this same item at a lower price than other online retailers!
customer_reviews.author: mtan10

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: It a very sturdy storage. I use for me kitchen as a storage on top and the cabinets too. I have kept all my appliances like instant pot, stand mixer and nitro bullet big blender. I had a little difficulty in assembling it. Rest I loved everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great Accent Storage and well built
customer_reviews.text: This product was really easy to build as the directions are very well laid out with accurate and detailed illustrations. The unboxing and assembly took a little over an hour. It looks great and is nice and sturdy. For the price you can't beat this storage cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A

customer_reviews.title: Turn back while you can...
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest pile of crap I’ve ever bought. It’s awful. The finish looks so fake a plastic surgeon would cringe. It might fall to pieces if someone touches it. This purchase will haunt me for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: ShandiKNC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put it together fairly quickly. I didn’t time it but no more than an hour I am sure. The top piece did have a crack in it on the presses wood side but it didn’t affect the pieces ability to stay together nor the appearance so I didn’t worry about it. It looks great put together and I would buy from this company again. I added photos of it in its space in my living room entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Reign

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. I found it to be a great value. The instructions were some of the best I've seen. The packaging was well organized and made it easy to see all of the separate pieces. Each piece was clearly labeled. It was a really smooth experience without any drama. I would definitely buy other items from this company based on my experience putting this together. It looks very nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Please disregard the pervious review. Operator error. Once I got it put together correctly I absolutely love it! It’s a little smaller than I imagined but it will work great for what I want it to be. I got it to give a little color in the room and to put extra dvds in. Took awhile to put together by myself. Very stylish
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra becker

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, so don’t expect a real quality piece of furniture, it did have some dings here and there but they were mostly hidden when assembled. It works in the spare room for an accent piece but not nice enough for main living spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Two day shipping??!!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in TWO. DAYS! I had to look it up, I am a few hours away from the nearest amazon warehouse!! I didn’t expect it for over a week! It was easy to put together and it looks great! We use it for a Keurig. The Keurig itself fits great! The Keurig roller drawer is a slightly too big, it fits nice if you turn it sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Sturdy, Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 65” tv stand in our bedroom. Beautiful, Study & a great price. Takes about 20 minutes for two people to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Costal Living

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for under 200 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to create an “island” in my kitchen. Easy to assemble, door hinges have a nice YouTube video to help adjust. I’m probably going to by another on and have them side hi side and add a slab quartz to make it a easy addiction to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small storage cabinet for Tupperware type containers. This cabinet is now adjacent to the kitchen so my 80+ mom no longer has to climb a small ladder to retrieve a container. I would not hesitate to order the same cabinet again if needed again. Color was as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, I also have the book case. Pretty easy to put together and it looks great in our living room. The off white color is really pretty and has a country feel.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together! A second person would be recommended but I did it alone. The pieces were labeled and even the parts had corresponding numbers which helped. Power drill (or screw driver) and hammer required. This was a much better experience than most of my at home assembly! I love this cabinet. Really glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the master closet after we tore out some awful built-ins. It is well packed, well made (though not real wood naturally), and not completely difficult to put together. It made it sound a whole lot worse than it was. Really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. The cabinet was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I have it in my bedroom and it is a great match to my light colored furniture. Color is true to the picture. I am very happy with this purchase. There were no flaws, cracks or ships in the wood. Pleased customer!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy About Skagen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely cabinet, great accent to a room
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Nice edition to my dining room. Item arrived a day earlier than expected and in great condition. Easy assembly with clear directions, put it together myself in about 45 minutes- an hour. Attaching the doors was the most difficult part and it still wasn’t bad. Missing a screw, but little impact as I was able to assemble. Item is very light in consideration of what it is. Overall very pleased. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leg snapped when it was completely set up!
customer_reviews.text: It took a little over an hour to put this cabinet together it was easy to put together, as soon as we finished putting it together and had it up right moved to the area we wanted it and set it down the back left leg snapped! I Gorilla glued it back together so it works for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly in the spot I wanted to put it. The only thing I can say that I am disappointed in is it's a little bit smaller than I anticipated. I planned on storing my Kitchenaid stand mixer in it, but it's not deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I made this my coffee station in the kitchen. All of my coffee supplies fit and look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Misleading pictures! Beware
customer_reviews.text: This piece is very cute, but the pictures are misleading - the tan style has no distress whatsoever. It's solid beige color, not like the picture. Also, the knobs don't stay in very well. Had to improvise to make one of them work.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Chernavska

customer_reviews.title: Guessing U.S. design. Pretty good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: They were honest in admitting it was made in China but I think to US design. Manual was clear. Unit is study and I got the doors adjusted pretty much perfect. I will buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Love this cabinet!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cabinet!!! It was so easy to put together. Took about 1 hour and 15 minutes. The instructions were very easy to follow. It’s sturdy and strong and looks really nice!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Rzecki

customer_reviews.title: This thing is not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: We are using it as a place to store alcohol. I should have read how short it was, I was mainly looking at the width and I didn't want anything too wide. Overall it looks nice. I think it holds more weight then it claims also.
customer_reviews.author: Simpuhl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for entryway!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was in perfect condition and took a little over an hour to assemble. The bench is pretty sturdy and well built! We love it as an entryway table to store our shoes in. Haven't gotten decor for it yet, but its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Palmer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but frustrating
customer_reviews.text: The thing is crazy, I have bought more expensive storage cabinets with less assembly.... If you want frustration this is your pantry.... Beautiful but not worth the effort to assemble in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Romero

product_meta.title: Bush Furniture Salinas Accent Storage Cabinet with Doors in Antique White
product_meta.description: Color:Antique White| Pattern Name:CabinetComplement the casual feel of your home with a storage solution designed for your convenience and comfort. The Bush Furniture Salinas Accent Storage Cabinet with Doors blends unique details and adjustable features for use in a variety of spaces. Complete your home office, hallway, entryway or living room with a casual two-door Cabinet featuring open and concealed storage. Place your favorite pictures, plants or a lamp on the spacious top while showing off additional decorations in the open cubby shelves below. Inspired by timeless Mission style, doors with vertical wood accents and elegant Tumbled Pewter hardware conceal any items you don't want out in the open. The Storage Cabinet contains two adjustable shelves, one behind each door. Tapered legs and curved base rails join your choice of Antique White, Cape Cod Gray and Vintage Black finishes to provide a comfortable country feel in the homes of today. The Storage Cabinet with Doors is tested to meet ANSI/SOHO quality standards for safety and performance and is backed by the Bush Furniture 1 Year Manufacturer's Warranty. Complete your space with coordinating items from the Salinas Collection.
feature_bullets: Storage Cabinet with Doors finished in Antique White with a slightly distressed touch for a casual look
Elegant metal drop pull hardware finished in Tumbled Pewter
Concealed storage cabinets and open cubby shelves create variety of organization options
46W x 13D x 30H Accent Cabinet contains one adjustable shelf behind each door and another in center compartment
Three distressed finish options include Cape Cod Gray, Vintage Black or a cream colored Antique White with Tumbled Pewter hardware

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,244 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
